DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: Evaluation of capsule endoscopy in the emergency setting of severe GI-Bleeding.
DOC.brief_title: Emergency Capsule Endoscopy in Severe GI-bleeding
DOC.criteria: patients with signs of severe GIbleeding (with melena or dark bloody stool) and hemodynamic instability (defined as (pre)collapse or MAP < 80 mmHg or HR > 110) and/or drop of hemoglobin > 2g/dl/d and/or need of transfusion of minimum of 2 packed red cells missing consent form, pregnancy, origin of bleeding found in upper GIendoscopy (e.g. blood in the stomach, ulcer, varices with signs of bleeding, malloryweisstear, Angiodysplasia (with signs of bleeding), refluxesophagitis LA C or D) fresh bloody stool, known stenosis of the bowel, known site of bleeding, known inflammatory bowel disease
